00010     connect();
00011 
00012     cout << "Connected to Robot" << endl;
00013     cout << "Proceeding to test camera" << endl;
00014 
00015     cout << "Testing Color, if image looks correct close display" << endl;
00016     cout << "If not, try restarting robot, and rerunning test" << endl;
00017 
00018     PicturePtr color = robot.takePicture("color");
00019     color->show("Color");
00020 
00021     cout << "Testing Grayscale" << endl;
00022     PicturePtr gray = robot.takePicture("gray");
00023     gray->show("Gray");
00024 
00025     cout << "Testing Jpeg Color" << endl;
00026     PicturePtr jpeg = robot.takePicture("jpeg");
00027     jpeg->show("Color JPEG");
00028 
00029     cout << "Testing Jpeg Gray" << endl;
00030     PicturePtr grayjpeg = robot.takePicture("grayjpeg");
00031     grayjpeg->show("Gray JPEG");
00032 
00033     cout << "All Camera Test Completed\n";

00036
